Title: Lagrimas de Oro
Plot: Alice pushes Dana to break up with Tonya, but Dana isn't prepared for when Tonya reveals her own secret. Tina considers her new attraction to Helena, Kit finally hooks up with Benjamin, and Jenny and Carmen continue to enjoy each other's company.
GuestStars: Bob Glouberman,  Stefanie Von Pfetten,  Vangelis Stoudis,  Chris William Martin,  Heather Douglas,  Leanne Adachi,  Melissa Rivers
